statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points < 50;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points >= 100;
SELECT customer_id, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent < 500;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points >= 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent <= 2000;
SELECT customer_id, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name IN ('John', 'Emily');
SELECT customer_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 200;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent = 1500;
SELECT customer_id, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points = 0;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id IN (3, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent > 500;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_spent) AS total_spent_sum FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent >= 1000 AND loyalty_points > 50;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points * 2 AS updated_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent < 500;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points = (SELECT MAX(loyalty_points) FROM loyalty_program);
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, ROUND(total_spent * 0.1, 2) AS discount FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_spent) AS total_spent_sum, AVG(total_spent) AS total_spent_avg FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS loyalty_program_count FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 10, 15);
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent > 100 AND loyalty_points < 50;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent = (SELECT MIN(total_spent) FROM loyalty_program);
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_spent > (SELECT AVG(total_spent) FROM loyalty_program);
SELECT customer_name, CASE WHEN total_spent > 500 THEN 'High Spender' ELSE 'Regular Spender' END AS spending_category FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_name NOT LIKE '%test%';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program_customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_rewards;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name FROM loyalty_rewards;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, required_points FROM loyalty_rewards;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, reward_id FROM loyalty_program_customers, loyalty_rewards;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_id, reward_name, required_points FROM loyalty_program_customers, loyalty_rewards;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE customer_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE required_points > 100;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE reward_name LIKE '%gift%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, required_points FROM loyalty_rewards ORDER BY required_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, reward_id, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers, loyalty_rewards WHERE customer_id = reward_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers, loyalty_rewards WHERE loyalty_points >= required_points;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_rewards LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, required_points FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE required_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_customers GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points >= required_points;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points <= 500 AND customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers LEFT JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points >= required_points;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points BETWEEN required_points - 100 AND required_points + 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, required_points, (loyalty_points - required_points) AS points_diff FROM loyalty_program_customers, loyalty_rewards WHERE customer_id = reward_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points < (SELECT AVG(loyalty_points) FROM loyalty_program_customers);
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM loyalty_program_customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_customers > 1;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers LEFT OUTER JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points >= required_points;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points >= 500);
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, required_points FROM loyalty_program_customers INNER JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points >= required_points ORDER BY required_points ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points = (SELECT MAX(loyalty_points) FROM loyalty_program_customers);
SELECT customer_name, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points >= required_points GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE loyalty_points < 100 OR loyalty_points > 500;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers INNER JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points + required_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(loyalty_points) AS avg_points FROM loyalty_program_customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING avg_points > 500;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%son' OR customer_name LIKE '%sen';
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, required_points FROM loyalty_program_customers INNER JOIN loyalty_rewards ON loyalty_points < required_points;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT customer_id, reward_description, reward_points_required FROM rewards WHERE reward_points_required < 500;
SELECT customer_id, reward_description FROM rewards WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, reward_description, reward_points_required FROM rewards WHERE customer_id = 102 AND reward_points_required >= 200;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM loyalty_program JOIN purchases ON loyalty_program.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description, reward_points_required FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT L.customer_name, R.reward_description FROM loyalty_program L JOIN rewards R ON L.customer_id = R.customer_id WHERE R.reward_points_required < 300;
SELECT L.customer_name, P.purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program L JOIN purchases P ON L.customer_id = P.customer_id WHERE P.purchase_date >= '2022-06-01' AND P.purchase_amount < 100;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(purchase_amount) AS min_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(loyalty_points) AS max_loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT AVG(loyalty_points) AS avg_loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases JOIN loyalty_program ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM loyalty_program LEFT JOIN purchases ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description FROM loyalty_program JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description FROM loyalty_program RIGHT JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description FROM loyalty_program INNER JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description FROM loyalty_program LEFT JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE loyalty_points > 200;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description FROM loyalty_program RIGHT JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE reward_points_required < 50;

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_description FROM loyalty_program INNER JOIN rewards ON loyalty_program.customer_id = rewards.customer_id WHERE loyalty_points > 100 AND reward_points_required < 50;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases JOIN loyalty_program ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_spent FROM purchases JOIN loyalty_program ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases JOIN loyalty_program ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_spent FROM purchases JOIN loyalty_program ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MIN(purchase_amount) AS min_spent FROM purchases JOIN loyalty_program ON purchases.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(reward_points_required) AS total_points_required FROM rewards JOIN loyalty_program ON rewards.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(reward_points_required) AS avg_points_required FROM rewards JOIN loyalty_program ON rewards.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM rewards JOIN loyalty_program ON rewards.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(reward_points_required) AS max_points_required FROM rewards JOIN loyalty_program ON rewards.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MIN(reward_points_required) AS min_points_required FROM rewards JOIN loyalty_program ON rewards.customer_id = loyalty_program.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program.customers;
SELECT loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program.customers;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_total FROM loyalty_program.orders;
SELECT order_date FROM loyalty_program.orders;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.rewards;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, loyalty_points_required FROM loyalty_program.rewards;
SELECT description FROM loyalty_program.rewards;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id FROM loyalty_program.customer_rewards;
SELECT redeemed, received_date FROM loyalty_program.customer_rewards;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program.customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_total FROM loyalty_program.orders WHERE order_total > 1000;
SELECT reward_name, loyalty_points_required FROM loyalty_program.rewards WHERE loyalty_points_required < 50;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id FROM loyalty_program.customer_rewards WHERE redeemed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_total FROM loyalty_program.orders ORDER BY order_total ASC;
SELECT reward_name, loyalty_points_required FROM loyalty_program.rewards ORDER BY loyalty_points_required DESC;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id FROM loyalty_program.customer_rewards ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program.customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, order_total, order_date FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(order_total) AS total_spent FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id;
SELECT reward_name, loyalty_points_required FROM loyalty_program.rewards WHERE loyalty_points_required <= 500;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.customer_rewards WHERE redeemed = TRUE;

SELECT customers.customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM loyalty_program.customer_rewards JOIN loyalty_program.customers ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN loyalty_program.rewards ON rewards.reward_id = customer_rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT customer_name, redeemed FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id WHERE redeemed = FALSE;

SELECT customer_name, description FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN loyalty_program.rewards ON rewards.reward_id = customer_rewards.reward_id WHERE redeemed = TRUE;

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, received_date FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id WHERE received_date IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM loyalty_program.orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(order_total) AS total_spent, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(loyalty_points_required) AS total_points_required FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN loyalty_program.rewards ON rewards.reward_id = customer_rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.orders WHERE order_total BETWEEN 100 AND 500;

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points + loyalty_points_required AS total_points FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN loyalty_program.rewards ON rewards.reward_id = customer_rewards.reward_id;
SELECT customer_name, order_date::DATE, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) AS order_month FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM loyalty_program.customers JOIN loyalty_program.customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id WHERE redeemed = TRUE GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT * FROM loyalty_program.orders JOIN loyalty_program.customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN loyalty_program.rewards ON orders.order_total >= rewards.loyalty_points_required;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id, claimed_date FROM customer_rewards;
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM rewards;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_tiers;
SELECT customer_name, purchases.purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, rewards.reward_name, claimed_date FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id INNER JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, rewards.reward_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id LEFT JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, tier_name FROM customers JOIN loyalty_tiers ON loyalty_points >= point_threshold;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, tier_name FROM customers JOIN loyalty_tiers ON loyalty_points >= point_threshold WHERE customers.customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_rewards);

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, reward_name FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE claimed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, purchases.total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, COUNT(reward_id) AS num_rewards FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name, loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name, loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name, loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, MAX(total_amount) AS max_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name, loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, MIN(total_amount) AS min_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name, loyalty_points;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, point_cost FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, tier_name FROM customers JOIN loyalty_tiers ON customers.loyalty_points >= loyalty_tiers.point_threshold;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MIN(total_amount) AS min_purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(total_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(total_amount) AS average_purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, claimed_date FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE claimed_date IS NOT NULL;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, claimed_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE claimed_date IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(reward_id) AS total_rewards_claimed FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, total_amount, CASE WHEN total_amount > 100 THEN 'High Value' ELSE 'Low Value' END AS purchase_category FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, CASE WHEN loyalty_points > 1000 THEN 'Gold' WHEN loyalty_points > 500 THEN 'Silver' ELSE 'Bronze' END AS loyalty_tier FROM customers;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, point_cost, expiration_date FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE expiration_date >= CURDATE();

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, point_cost, expiration_date FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE();

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, claimed_date FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id ORDER BY claimed_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, reward_name, claimed_date FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id ORDER BY claimed_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
